head.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the head equipment slot.
head.markdownDescription: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the head equipment slot.

chest.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the chest equipment slot.
chest.markdownDescription: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the chest equipment slot.

legs.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the legs equipment slot.
legs.markdownDescription: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the legs equipment slot.

feet.description: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the feet equipment slot.
feet.markdownDescription: If specified, items which fulfills this condition cannot be equipped in the feet equipment slot.

tick_rate.description: The frequency (in ticks) with which to check the condition. Lower values mean the condition changes are detected more quickly, but this comes at a potentially huge performance cost.
tick_rate.markdownDescription: The frequency (in ticks) with which to check the condition. Lower values mean the condition changes are detected more quickly, but this comes at a potentially huge performance cost.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/conditioned_restrict_armor)

Restricts the entity that has the power from equipping items as armor (via right-click, dispensing or by dragging and dropping the item in the equipment slot(s)) in the specified equipment slot(s); may depend on a `condition`.

Type ID: `origins:conditioned_restrict_armor`

!!! note

    You can use the [Restrict Armor (Power Type)](restrict_armor.md) if an entity condition is not needed.
